thread.title: Julene Klosterman
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Julene Klosterman

author: Julene Klosterman
title: Julene Klosterman
text: It's only been about a week, but the countertop water filter that I ordered, seems to be working fine. It does have a very slow drip, which the directions claim should subside, though I've yet to see that happen. I recieved my countertop water filter within a few days~impressive! When I called customer service, they were very courteous & promptly answered my question.
